## List
```{python}
#| title: Grocery List
# Create a checkbox list in markdown format
from graph import generate_list
df = generate_list()

markdown_list = []
for i, row in df.iterrows():
    # print(row)
    markdown_list.append(f"- {"[ ]"} {row['Quantity']} {row['Ingredient']}")

# Output the markdown formatted list as a string
markdown_output = "\n".join(markdown_list)

from IPython.display import display, Markdown
display(Markdown(markdown_output))

```
